name: Scrimmage
description:
Short Game I created for Uni.

There is a combination of paid assets and custom ones I created.

I spent about a month or two to create this game and I will no longer be working on it any further. This is the first full fledged game I have ever created so please cut me some slack if there are issues, but id be more that happy to hear feedback on it. :)

Thank you for playing or even just looking at my game!

Credits:
